item.title: Big pile of food dumped in Hackney Downs park, 11th February
item.description:
This pile is located in the North-West corner of Hackney Downs, a little off the walkway, but perfectly visible. These food dumps appear in that particular part of the park weekly ish. It looks like a business dumps their waste on a regular basis.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Downs Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: West Hampstead Primary School, 11th February
item.description:
Tree roots are causing many injuries to the school children as they are breaking through the tarmac causing a serious trip hazard. I would like to replace the tree with another one.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dornfell Street, West Hampstead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Van parked illegally on pavement, 11th February
item.description:

item.title: Huge deep pothole hole outside or near 5 College Road, 11th February
item.description:
This pothole and nearby deformities in the road were already forming and in progress when the council resurfaced the rest of College Road some months ago. It was very obvious that all of the defects would get worse overtime and there was no good reason not to resurface all the way to the traffic lights. Not doing so is a huge waste of taxpayers money and has resulted in lots of inconvenience, noise and damage. Cars and lorries are now flooding into this pothole shaking all of the properties along the street which add insult to the Injury already caused by the banging crashing and vibrations emanating from Farwig Lane. The pothole is now dangerously deep if it gets worse there is a risk of accidents and with people on the pavement regularly nearby, a bus stop nearby, and properties nearby this is incredibly dangerous.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Glebe Road, Plaistow, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 3 x fly tipped internal doors, 11th February
item.description:
3 x fly tipped doors left on the pavement leaning against the side wall of 21 Court Farm Road, which is on the corner of Dorset Road. Please take them away.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dorset Road, Mottingham, Greater London

item.title: Another Pot Hole, 11th February
item.description:
Along this road there is yet another new pot hole right on the bend, so you have to drive away from it to oncoming traffice so very dangerous. The whole length of this road is littered with dangerous un repaired pot hole that NEED URGENT ATTENTION PLEASE.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Another Pot hole, 11th February
item.description:
There are two pot holes here, another one a few yards from this one. This is a very busy road and a lot of HGV useing it as a short cut from the M25 which is causing a lot of damage to this road. There are many more pot holes further along this road after the railway bridge.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A number of new pot holes, 11th February
item.description:
Between the small roundabout and the A127 junction rounabout heading towards Herogate/brentwood there are a number of large pot holes. This is a main road with heavy traffic and needs urgent attention.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large furniture dumped on narrow path - cannot use path, 11th February
item.description:
Large furniture dumped on narrow path - cannot use path. This furniture was dumped here around 2 weeks ago and since then the pedestrian pathway has been difficult to use. Many of use having to walk on the road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Daniel Gardens, Old Kent Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
